mapper.update:
update BOS.BAS_PARTITION
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONECODE = #{zonecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTINT = #{startint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TERMINATEINT = #{terminateint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SDINT = #{sdint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.BAS_PARTITION set PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONECODE = #{zonecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTINT = #{startint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TERMINATEINT = #{terminateint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SDINT = #{sdint,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from BAS_Partition b) where rn between #{page} and #{rows}
